subject: Code issue with order.
description_text:
https://www.instagram.com/p/DLHk6NFAbxQ/?igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

Hello. I placed an order for these haptics just now I didn't realize the code FFLV20 didn't work. I ordered hoping to utilize it since the ad shows it's for the item I bought.

#SSN1826 is my order number.

Can I still get this code attached somehow? Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Rhys Benham,  I checked your order and it didn't meet the restriction to use the discount over $199 so it's not available, sorry .

Okay. Thanks. I feel it is a bit misleading though since it doesn't say anything about minimum order of 199 on the ads I've seen. It just says $20 code and shows the item I bought.
________________________________
Hi Rhys Benham,     Sorry for the misinformation, but we actually labeled this condition of use.

Can you check my tracking number for me please. There is no update at all.  Maybe it is the wrong tracking number? Thanks

Sent via the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 5G, an AT&T 5G smartphone
Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Hi Rhys Benham,    Our software currently supports 10 games. May I ask which game you are using now?  We are continuously working to add telemetry support for more titles.  In the meantime, you can use the internal version of SimHub that I’ve provided. The official release is still undergoing testing and may take a bit more time.      https://drive.google.com/file/d/1QrSbAvCC5iyx9XgdRgSQV-hWpmDGkujc/view?usp=sharing

Assetto corsa.

Please tell me my order update. Is it shipped. I want tracking number. Thanks

Sent via the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 5G, an AT&T 5G smartphone
Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________
Hi Rhys Benham,    Since today is Sunday, we will check the shipping status and get back to you tomorrow.

Thank you

Sent via the Samsung Galaxy S23 Ultra 5G, an AT&T 5G smartphone
Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>
________________________________

Please let me know the status for my order shipment. Thank you
________________________________

Order number SSN1826
Please check my order. It has no shipping updates all week. Thanks
________________________________

Hi Rhys Benham,    Sorry for the delay, we have updated your logistics tracking information for you and your package is expected to arrive around the 9th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=JSEXB2466850256YQ
